1027570.name: The Deep Deep
1027570.description:
Command a party of stalwart dwarves and delve Deep, Deep into their shattered kingdom to reclaim it from the ork and goblin invaders. Crawl, explore, and battle through the ruins of the dwarven kingdom using tactics and skills. Reclaim ancient dwarven artifacts to bolster the power and abilities of your party.

The Deep Deep is a tactical dungeon crawler in a side-scrolling environment. Explore dark mines, ruined cities, and lava-filled caverns; solve puzzles and battle enemies to unlock dwarven classes and find treasure. Select the equipment and party composition that suits your play style; fast-paced or slow and methodical, special abilities or basic attacks?

Features

  • Simultaneously control a party of dwarves in tactical side-scrolling gameplay.
  • Build a party from 5 dwarven classes, each with unique abilities, equipment and strategies.
  • Find secret areas to acquire ability-augmenting loot, unlocking new play styles.
  • Test your skills in challenge levels, fight altered bosses, and overcome reimagined campaign scenarios.
  • Explore and illuminate the beautiful painted environments using items and abilities.
  • Original, dynamic sound track that flows with the environment and action.
1027570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
